validation.mustBeUsedWithinForm: useFormField must be used within FormField

DocsUnderverse.pageDescription: This page demonstrates how to use the available UI components in the project, provided by the <packageName>@underverse-ui/underverse</packageName> package.

toast.title: Toast
toast.description: The buttons below will display toast notifications.

dateRangePicker.placeholder: Placeholder when no range is selected.

calendar.selectMode: Selection mode: single, multiple, or range.
calendar.events: Array of events to display as colored dots.
calendar.renderDay: Custom renderer for a day cell.
calendar.labels: Localization labels for weekdays and header.
calendar.display: Display mode: month grid or a single week.
calendar.months: Number of months to render side-by-side (month mode).
calendar.disabledDates: List or predicate to disable specific dates.
calendar.cellMode: Day cell mode: compact dots or large event list.
calendar.maxEventsPerDay: Maximum number of visible events per day (events mode).
calendar.renderEvent: Custom renderer for an event row (events mode).
calendar.enableEventSheet: Open a right-side sheet when clicking an event.
calendar.eventSheetOpen: Controlled open state for the sheet.
calendar.onEventSheetOpenChange: Open state change handler for the sheet.

calendarTimeline.enableEventSheet: Open a right-side sheet when clicking an event.
calendarTimeline.renderEventSheet: Custom renderer for the event details sheet content.
calendarTimeline.selectedEventId: Controlled selected event id for the sheet.
calendarTimeline.eventSheetOpen: Controlled open state for the event sheet.
calendarTimeline.date: Anchor date for the current view (controlled).
calendarTimeline.timeZone: IANA timezone used for rendering and calculations.
calendarTimeline.locale: BCP47 locale used for formatting headers.
calendarTimeline.resourceColumnWidth: Width of the left resource column.
calendarTimeline.defaultResourceColumnWidth: Default left column width when uncontrolled.
calendarTimeline.onResourceColumnWidthChange: Called when the user resizes the left column.
calendarTimeline.onRowHeightChange: Called when the user resizes row height.
calendarTimeline.onRowHeightsChange: Called when per-resource row heights change.
calendarTimeline.enableLayoutResize: Allow resizing column/row using mouse drag.
calendarTimeline.maxLanesPerRow: Maximum event lanes shown per row before collapsing into +more.
calendarTimeline.onCreateEvent: Called when creating an event by dragging on empty cells.
calendarTimeline.onEventMove: Called when an event is moved.
calendarTimeline.onEventResize: Called when an event is resized.

list.itemClassName: Class applied to all list items (useful for padding).

listItem.label: Primary text.
listItem.contentClassName: Class for inner content (useful for padding).

timePicker.onChange: Called with the new time string or undefined.
timePicker.label: Label text above the control.

colorPicker.format: Output format for onChange (hex or rgba).

grid.columns: Number of columns or full CSS template.
grid.rows: Number of rows or full CSS template.
grid.minColumnWidth: Use auto-fit with this min width to create responsive columns.
grid.alignContent: Align the grid content as a whole.
grid.justifyContent: Justify the grid content as a whole.
grid.outlined: Apply Card-like rounded border and background.

watermark.text: Watermark text to render (supports multi-line as array).
watermark.preset: Preset watermark style (confidential, draft, sample, copyright, doNotCopy, internal).
watermark.fullPage: Render as fixed overlay over the entire viewport.
watermark.animate: Enable fade animation for visibility toggle.
watermark.overlayClassName: Custom class for the overlay layer.

timeline.align: Content alignment relative to the line.
timeline.variant: Visual style for items (default, outlined, card, minimal, modern, gradient).
timeline.size: Size of markers and spacing (sm, md, lg, xl).
timeline.lineStyle: Style of connecting line (solid, dashed, dotted).
timeline.animate: Animate items on mount with slide-in effect.
timeline.dense: Compact spacing mode for dense information.

timelineItem.title: Primary title of the item.
timelineItem.time: Time label displayed under the content.
timelineItem.color: Explicit color for the marker (overrides status).
timelineItem.badge: Badge/tag content displayed next to title.

fallingIcons.icon: Icon component rendered as falling particle.
fallingIcons.areaClassName: Custom class for the outer area.
fallingIcons.className: Custom class for inner animation layer.

button.onClick: Click handler; may return a Promise (works with preventDoubleClick).
button.iConClassName: Custom class for the left icon.
button.loading: Show loading state and lock interactions.
button.fullWidth: Expand to full width of container.
button.title: Native title tooltip; fallback for aria-label.
button.preventDoubleClick: Debounce double-clicks to prevent rapid submissions.

badge.dot: Show as a small dot (no content).

avatar.status: Status type: online, offline, busy, away, none.

breadcrumb.showHome: Show Home item at the start.

card.title: Card title.
card.contentClassName: Custom class for content area. Supports smart padding override (e.g., 'px-4' keeps default 'py').

modal.title: Modal title.
modal.noPadding: Remove default body padding (useful for media).
modal.fullWidth: Stretch modal to full width without side margin.

tabs.tabs: List of tabs (value, label, content, icon?, disabled?).

toast.ToastProvider: Provider that enables toasts across the app.
toast.maxToasts: Maximum number of toasts to display.

loading.ButtonLoading: Wrapper to show loading state for a button.

tooltip.delay: Open/close delay (ms) or object {openBrace} open, close {closeBrace}.

checkbox.label: Label content shown next to the box.
checkbox.containerClassName: Custom class for the outer wrapper.
checkbox.className: Custom class for the hidden input.
checkbox.name: Input name attribute.

carousel.children: Slides to render inside the carousel.
carousel.showProgress: Show top progress bar when auto-scrolling.
carousel.loop: Loop back to start/end when reaching limits.
carousel.slidesToShow: Number of slides visible at once.
carousel.slidesToScroll: Number of slides to move per step.
carousel.slideClassName: Custom class for each slide wrapper.
carousel.onSlideChange: Callback when current slide index changes.
carousel.thumbnailRenderer: Custom renderer for thumbnails (child, index) => node.
carousel.ariaLabel: Accessible label for the carousel region.

skeleton.lines: Number of lines (effective when variant = text).

SkeletonCard.children: Custom skeleton content instead of default layout.

alert.title: Alert title.
alert.dismissible: Show a close button and allow dismiss.

popover.matchTriggerWidth: Match content width to trigger width.

overlayControls.onSeekPreview: Return preview image URL for time.

scrollArea.contentClassName: Custom class for inner viewport (set padding here).

dropdownMenu.items: Menu items array (label, icon?, onClick, disabled?, destructive?).

section.contained: Add container wrapper with mx-auto. Default: false.
section.gradientFrom: Gradient start color (Tailwind class, e.g. from-purple-500/20).
section.gradientTo: Gradient end color (Tailwind class, e.g. to-pink-500/20).

smartImage.fill: Use fill layout; else use width/height.

categoryTreeSelect.categories: Flat list of categories (id, name, parent_id).
categoryTreeSelect.onChange: Change handler (ids array or single id).
categoryTreeSelect.onNodeClick: Callback when clicking a node (useful for navigation).
categoryTreeSelect.viewOnly: Render as read-only tree view (no select functionality).

input.label: Label text shown above the input.
input.variant: Visual style variant (default, filled, outlined, minimal).
input.leftIcon: Left icon component inside the field.
input.rightIcon: Right icon component inside the field.
input.clearable: Show a clear (X) button when has value.
input.onClear: Callback when clicking the clear button.
input.hint: Small hint text below the field.
input.counter: Show character counter when maxLength is provided.

passwordInput.strengthLabels: Labels for strength levels (Weak, Fair, Good, Strong).

datePicker.id: Native id attribute for the trigger button.
datePicker.onChange: Change handler receiving selected date or undefined when cleared.
datePicker.label: Field label above the trigger.
datePicker.weekdayLabels: Custom weekday labels, falls back to Su..Sa.

dateRangePicker.placeholder: Placeholder when no range is selected.

pagination.alignment: Alignment of the control (left, center, right).
pagination.pageSizeOptions: Options for items per page selector.
pagination.onPageSizeChange: Change handler for items per page.
pagination.totalItems: Total number of items across all pages.

Form.onSubmit: Submit handler invoked with form data.
Form.className: Custom class for the form element.

FormField.name: Field name registered in the form.
FormField.render: Render function receiving field and fieldState.

FormControl.note: Wrapper that wires accessibility ids and error states.

FormSubmitButton.loading: Disable and show busy state while submitting.

languageSwitcher.locales: Available language options (code, name, optional flag).
languageSwitcher.onSwitch: Callback invoked with selected language code.

themeToggle.noProps: This component reads and updates ThemeContext; it has no public props.

UEditor.placeholder: Type '/' for commands, or just start writing...
